name: format

rules.to: Notification timer finished. Please turn off manually.
Backup timer finished. Turned off Shelly plug.

name: function 1
func:
msg.message = msg.message + ' with ' + msg.data.attributes.duration;
return msg;

name: function 4
func:
msg.message = msg.message + ' with ' + msg.data.attributes.duration;
return msg;
